item.name: etinker.cutoff
item.desc: In the xyz_N file for the charged molecule N only neighboring molecules up to the cutoff (in nm) are written out. If no cutoff is provided 50nm is assumed

item.name: etinker.order
item.desc: If order is "keep" the ordering of the molecules is not affected. If "top" is chosen, the charged molecule N will be on top of the xyz_N file.
